name: Promotion Class: Alpha Warrior
description:
Role: Melee Damage

This terror fuels increased critical strikes with dominance gained from their powers.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225
Critical Strike +3%

Traits Granted:
Great Axe Mastery
Great Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Leap: Now adds a point of Dominance.
Whirling Pain: Now reduces enemy's Anti-Critical Strike.
Neckbreaker: Now has its cost reduced to 350 and consumes Dominance to automatically land a Critical.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Alpha Warrior  promotion class and prevents access to the Pit Fighter and Barbarian promotion classes.
